oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gatlin Brothers Interview by Bob Allen 8-26-80
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is an interview of The Gatlin Brothers by Bob Allen. The interview takes place on 8-26-80.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: The Gatlin Brothers;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side One - (0:47) -- Steve Gatlin describes what he desires from the bio written by Bob Allen. Steve Gatlin mentions that he would like a short introduction of the band (Larry, Steve, Rudy) about their continued success. (2:52) -- Bob Allen asks about the origin of the Gatlin Brothers as a group. (4:07) -- Steve Gatlin mentions working with Tammy Wynette with Rudy Gatlin. (5:56) -- Bob Allen asks Steve Gatlin about the Gatlin Brothers first album together ("The Pilgrimage"). (7:21) -- Steve Gatlin speaks about making the first two albums with The Gatlin Brothers. (8:15) -- Steve Gatlin describes his educational background. Steve Gatlin received a bachelor's degree in education and half of a master's degree in education. (9:21) -- Steve Gatlin describes a show put on by Larry Gatlin for the Atlanta Falcons. Larry was performing with Tammy Wynette on the road with Rudy Gatlin. Steve Gatlin was then invited to join the group. (13:45) -- Interview switches to Larry Gatlin. (15:52) -- Bob Allen asks Larry Gatlin about the enjoyment of performing with his brothers. (17:18) -- Bob Allen asks about the bond between the Gatlin Brothers. (19:55) -- Larry Gatlin describes re-building chemistry with the band after spending time apart. (21:52) -- Bob Allen asks Larry Gatlin about the various roles of the Gatlin Brothers. (22:52) -- Bob Allen asks about the TV shows that The Gatlin Brothers have performed on. (23:28) -- Bob Allen asks about The Gatlin Brother's new LP, "Help Yourself." Larry Gatlin describes the general concept behind the album. (27:55) -- Larry Gatlin describes his happiness with the band's current image. (29:34) -- Larry Gatlin mentions that he would like the bio written by Bob Allen to emphasize that The Gatlin Brothers number one job is to give the audience a good show. (34:01) -- Interview continues with Rudy Gatlin. (34:33) -- Rudy Gatlin describes his role for The Gatlin Brothers in the studio. (36:17) -- Bob Allen asks Rudy Gatlin about the process of recording an album with his brothers. (36:58) -- Rudy Gatlin speaks about the recording process of "I Still Don't Love You Anymore." (38:17) -- Bob Allen asks Rudy Gatlin about The Gatlin Brothers new album "Help Yourself." (39:07) -- Bob Allen asks about the personality differences of The Gatlin Brothers. (41:32) -- Rudy Gatlin mentions an incorrect review he read recently about The Gatlin Brothers.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: The Gatlin Brothers; Gatlin, Larry, 1948-; Gatlin, Steve; Gatlin, Rudy;
